name: Out of Sight (Apiven Studios)
description:
Out of Sight is an urban fantasy story-driven 2D adventure game inspired by Slavic mythology. Set in the present of the decaying mining town in the Mostecko region, archaeology student Nela has to use her wit and knowledge to uncover the truth behind the strange occurrences.

Features:

  • Move around the world, explore and visit certain points of interest based on the story progression. Talk to characters in dialogues with non-linear aspects.
  • Gather information about the people, lore, creatures and place and use it as your advantage.
  • Inspect items in the environment, pick them up into the inventory.
  • Combine items in the inventory. Give items to characters who seek them. Use items from the inventory to perform actions in the environment.
  • Characters approach you differently or even refuse to speak with you based on equipped items. Learn characters’ preferences by interacting with the world and speaking with other characters.
  • Different dialogue options based on inspected items or gathered information.
  • Different dialogues based on story progression and previous interactions with characters.
  • Possible to solve certain quests slightly sooner or later out of linear order as player wishes.
  • Journal and Quest log to help you to keep track of your progress and gathered information.
